Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

College : Student :: Hospital : ?


A. Nurse
B. Doctor
C. Treatment
D. Patient
Solution: As Students read in College similarly Patients are treated in Hospital.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Tree : Forest :: Grass : ?


A. Lawn
B. Garden
C. Park
D. Field
Solution: As Tree is found in Forest similarly Grass is found in Lawn.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

South : North-West :: West : ?


A. North
B. South-West
C. North-East
D. East
Solution: As North-West is 135^o clockwise from South in the same were North-East is 135^o clockwise from the West.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Cloth : Mill :: Newspaper : ?


A. Editor
B. Reader
C. Paper
D. Press
Solution: As Cloth is made in a Mill, similarly Newspaper is printed in press.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Country : President :: State : ?


A. Governor
B. M.P
C. Legislator
D. Minister
Solution: As President is the nominal head of a country, similarly Governer is the nominal head of a State.
